channel.title: Captain Awesome
channel.description: Welcome to my blog! I write about modern web development.

item.title: Basic markdown style guide
item.description: You can author content using the familiar markdown syntax you already know. All basic markdown syntax is supported.

item.title: Extended markdown style guide
item.description: In addition to supporting all basic Markdoc syntax, this template also supports extended markdown syntax to render custom components.

item.title: Prism.js syntax highlighting for code blocks
item.description: Code blocks are syntax highlighted using Prism.js

item.title: You can also link to an external blog post
